thread.title: Salman Finds 'Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam' Poster 'Really Nice'
thread.title_full: Salman Finds 'Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam' Poster 'Really Nice'

title: Salman Finds 'Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam' Poster 'Really Nice'
text:
Email 2 
MUMBAI: Bollywood superstar Salman Khan says as compared to the poster of his upcoming film 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo', he finds that of his 1999 Bollywood romantic drama film 'Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam' better. 
Asked at the trailer launch of 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo', Salman today said, "That ('Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam') was a nice poster. Really nice poster...This one ('Prem Ratan Dhan Payo') also beautiful...pretty." 
The poster of 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' featuring Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor has been released, which has triggered comparisons with Sanjay Leela Bhansali film 'Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam' that featured Salman and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan.
